metadata.title: CVE-2017-2825 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high
metadata.description: In the trapper functionality of Zabbix Server 2.4.x, specifically craftedtrapper packets can pass database logic checks, resulting in databasewrites. An attacker can set up a Man-in-the-Middle server to alter trapperrequests made between an active Zabbix proxy and Server to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: zabbix: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
